metadata.description: Featuring six-pages Previews of four of Vertigo's hottest new titles for 2012! Writer Selwyn Seyfu Hinds crafts the tale of DOMINIQUE LAVEAU: VOODOO CHILD, the prime suspect in the death of New Orleans' Voodoo Queen! Then, in a twisted post-Victorian England, meet THE NEW DEADWARDIANS courtesy of Dan Abnett. Plus, writer Paul Cornell asks what if the next President of the United States was abducted by aliens? Arcadia Alvarado swears she was and now she's determined to win the election and stop the alien threat! Finally, spinning out of the smash hit FABLES, Bill Willingham tells the story of the FAIREST of them all!
metadata.name: Vertigo Preview
